headline: Mantle Ridge Sale Tests Confidence In Air Products Growth Story
summary: Director-level shareholder Mantle Ridge LP recently carried out a significant sale of Air Products and Chemicals (NYSE:APD) shares. The transaction involved a large block of stock and marks a meaningful change in insider ownership at the board level. Investors are watching the sale closely for any indications of shifting intentions or priorities by a key insider. Air Products and Chemicals, trading at about $282.39, has seen mixed recent performance, with a 3.7% decline over the past week...

headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Air Products (APD) Earnings Beat And Reaffirmed 2026 EPS Guidance
summary: In late January 2026, Air Products and Chemicals reported fiscal Q1 2026 adjusted EPS of US$3.16, with revenue of US$3.10 billion, higher operating income, and an expanded operating margin, while reaffirming full-year adjusted EPS guidance of US$12.85 to US$13.15. The results highlighted resilient performance in the core industrial gases business and reinforced management’s confidence in the company’s ability to deliver on its existing earnings outlook. We’ll now examine how this earnings...
